      • getJsonsToValidate

        public abstract java.util.List<Json> getJsonsToValidate()
        Define the way we get the json's to work on from your json file (using the Json module).
        Returns:
        A list of Json contains the json's to work on.

      • getJsonsToValidate

        public abstract java.util.List<Json> getJsonsToValidate(Json jsonRoot)
        Define the way we get the json's to work on from your json file (using the Json module).
        Parameters:
        jsonRoot - a Json object to define how to work on it.
        Returns:
        A list of Json contains the json's to work on.
